ARABIC: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The fools among us have uttered a vile slander against Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Certainly the foolish among us say preposterous things of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that “the foolish among us have been wont to say outrageous things about Allah”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The dimwit one (the devil) among us has been telling confused lies about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And that the fool among us used to utter false exaggerations against Allah.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `And that the foolish among us used to utter against Allah that which was an enormity in falsehood.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that the foolish amongst us used to forge extravagant things against Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The fool among us spoke against God outrage,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that the foolish one among us used to speak concerning Allah an atrocious lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And [now we know] that the foolish among us have been saying outrageous things about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the foolish among us were wont to forge lie against Allah exceedingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The foolish ones among us used to speak atrocious lies concerning Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There were some foolish ones among us, who used to utter extravagant lies against Allah;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that the foolish among us [i.e. Iblis (Satan) or the polytheists amongst the jinns] used to utter against Allah that which was wrong and not right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The ignorant fool among us has spoken outrageously against Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the fools among us used to say nonsense about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:4] And that the fool among us, the ignorant one among us, used to utter atrocious lies against God, extreme calumny by attributing to Him a spouse and a son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that the foolish one among us) i.e. the devil (used to speak concerning Allah an atrocious lie.
